title: 1994 Live Death (Feat Cancer,Exhorder,Suffocation Malev.Creation
description:
Review: Suffocation - These two tracks reveal slight cracks in the legendary precision of this percussive cryptogram whose lengthy songs narrative between textures and phrases through a recombining sequence of protean riffs. Overall the performance is solid but perhaps not the best from Suffocation.

Malevolent Creation - From the early years of this band when it was content to combine Floridian infective rhythm with the explosive emphatic rigidity of New York bands, Malevolent Creation record three tracks that are faster in tempo and tremolo speed than on record and thus, more convincing. It is the benefit of some years of on the road guitar practice applied to the inspirations of early career songwriting.


Tracklist

01. Suffocation - Jesus Wept 3:41
02. Suffocation - Infecting the Crypts 4:56
03. Malevolent Creation - Premature Burial 3:17
04. Malevolent Creation - Slaughter of Innocence 4:09
05. Malevolent Creation - Decadence Within 4:57
06. Exhorder - The Law 5:11
07. Exhorder - (Cadence of ) The Dirge 4:14
08. Exhorder - Desecrator 6:59
09. Cancer - Hung, Drawn and Quartered 3:22
10. Cancer - Blood Bath 4:10

Length: 44:59




As normal go to the shows and buy the merch,thats the best way to support the artist, That is if any of these guys are still performing,20 years or more in Death Metal is about 4 or 5 lifetimes, but if any still live, support em they will need it
